channel.title: jupyter on renhaoz
channel.description: Recent content in jupyter on renhaoz

item.title: Config of Jupyter Lab on WSL2
item.description: Install JupyterLab Run conda install -c conda-forge jupyterlab Config Browser of WSL2 Find browser’s path, my Chrome’s path is /mnt/c/Program\ Files/Google/Chrome/Application/chrome.exe. Create a quick link sudo ln -s /mnt/c/Program\ Files/Google/Chrome/Application/chrome.exe /usr/bin/chrome. (Try if this work chrome www.youtube.com) Run gedit /.~bashrc, and add browser to its last line export BROWSER='/usr/bin/chrome' Edit Jupyter Config File Generate jupyter config file jupyter notebook --generate-config Open it gedit ~/.jupyter/jupyter_notebook_config.py, find c.NotebookApp.use_redirect_file and set it to False.
